about.title: About <purple>AdsVideo</purple>
about.heroSubtitle: We're on a mission to democratize professional video creation, empowering businesses and creators with cutting-edge AI technology.
about.missionContent1: At AdsVideo, we believe that every business deserves access to professional-quality video content. Traditional video production is expensive, time-consuming, and requires specialized skills.
about.missionContent2: We're changing that by harnessing the power of AI to make video creation as simple as describing your vision. Our platform transforms your ideas into stunning advertising videos in minutes, not weeks.
about.innovationDescription: Leveraging the latest AI models including Sora 2 for cutting-edge results.
about.speedQualityDescription: Professional-grade videos in minutes, maintaining broadcast quality.
about.userCentricDescription: Designed for marketers, not technologists. No video editing skills required.
about.coreValuesSubtitle: These principles guide everything we do, from product development to customer support.
about.accessibilityDescription: Making professional video creation accessible to everyone, regardless of budget or technical expertise.
about.excellenceDescription: Delivering the highest quality AI-generated videos that meet professional broadcasting standards.
about.transparencyDescription: Clear pricing, honest communication, and transparent AI processes you can trust.
about.trustedSubtitle: Join the growing community of businesses creating amazing videos with AI
about.readySubtitle: Join thousands of businesses creating professional videos with AI

home.title: AdsVideo - Create Stunning AI-Generated Videos in Seconds
